GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns the type of the ApiChart class.

params.name: sTitle
params.description: The title which will be displayed for the current chart.

params.name: nFontSize
params.description: The text size value measured in points.

params.name: bIsBold
params.description: Specifies if the chart title is written in bold font or not.

params.name: sTitle
params.description: The title which will be displayed for the horizontal axis of the current chart.

params.name: nFontSize
params.description: The text size value measured in points.

params.name: bIsBold
params.description: Specifies if the horizontal axis title is written in bold font or not.

params.name: sTitle
params.description: The title which will be displayed for the vertical axis of the current chart.

params.name: nFontSize
params.description: The text size value measured in points.

params.name: bIsBold
params.description: Specifies if the vertical axis title is written in bold font or not.

params.name: sLegendPos
params.description: The position of the chart legend inside the chart window.

params.name: nFontSize
params.description: The text size value measured in points.

params.name: bIsMinMax
params.description: The true value will set the normal data direction for the vertical axis (from minimum to maximum). The false value will set the inverted data direction for the vertical axis (from maximum to minimum).

params.name: bIsMinMax
params.description: The true value will set the normal data direction for the horizontal axis (from minimum to maximum). The false value will set the inverted data direction for the horizontal axis (from maximum to minimum).

SetShowDataLabels.name: SetShowDataLabels
SetShowDataLabels.description: Specifies which chart data labels are shown for the chart.

params.name: bShowSerName
params.description: Whether to show or hide the source table column names used for the data which the chart will be build from.

params.name: bShowCatName
params.description: Whether to show or hide the source table row names used for the data which the chart will be build from.

params.name: bShowVal
params.description: Whether to show or hide the chart data values.

params.name: bShowPercent
params.description: Whether to show or hide the percent for the data values (works with stacked chart types).

SetShowPointDataLabel.name: SetShowPointDataLabel
SetShowPointDataLabel.description: Spicifies the show options for the chart data labels.

params.name: nSeriesIndex
params.description: The series index from the array of the data used to build the chart from.

params.name: nPointIndex
params.description: The point index from this series.

params.name: bShowSerName
params.description: Whether to show or hide the source table column names used for the data which the chart will be build from.

params.name: bShowCatName
params.description: Whether to show or hide the source table row names used for the data which the chart will be build from.

params.name: bShowVal
params.description: Whether to show or hide the chart data values.

params.name: bShowPercent
params.description: Whether to show or hide the percent for the data values (works with stacked chart types).

SetVertAxisTickLabelPosition.name: SetVertAxisTickLabelPosition
SetVertAxisTickLabelPosition.description: Spicifies tick label position for the vertical axis.

params.name: sTickLabelPosition
params.description: The position type of the chart vertical tick labels.

SetHorAxisTickLabelPosition.name: SetHorAxisTickLabelPosition
SetHorAxisTickLabelPosition.description: Spicifies tick label position for the horizontal axis.

params.name: sTickLabelPosition
params.description: The position type of the chart horizontal tick labels.

SetHorAxisMajorTickMark.name: SetHorAxisMajorTickMark
SetHorAxisMajorTickMark.description: Specifies the major tick mark for the horizontal axis.

params.name: sTickMark
params.description: The type of tick mark appearance.

SetHorAxisMinorTickMark.name: SetHorAxisMinorTickMark
SetHorAxisMinorTickMark.description: Specifies the minor tick mark for the horizontal axis.

params.name: sTickMark
params.description: The type of tick mark appearance.

SetVertAxisMajorTickMark.name: SetVertAxisMajorTickMark
SetVertAxisMajorTickMark.description: Specifies the major tick mark for the vertical axis.

params.name: sTickMark
params.description: The type of tick mark appearance.

SetVertAxisMinorTickMark.name: SetVertAxisMinorTickMark
SetVertAxisMinorTickMark.description: Specifies the minor tick mark for the vertical axis.

params.name: sTickMark
params.description: The type of tick mark appearance.

SetMajorVerticalGridlines.name: SetMajorVerticalGridlines
SetMajorVerticalGridlines.description: Specifies the visual properties for the major vertical gridlines.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the element shadow.

SetMinorVerticalGridlines.name: SetMinorVerticalGridlines
SetMinorVerticalGridlines.description: Specifies the visual properties for the minor vertical gridlines.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the element shadow.

SetMajorHorizontalGridlines.name: SetMajorHorizontalGridlines
SetMajorHorizontalGridlines.description: Specifies the visual properties for the major horizontal gridlines.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the element shadow.

SetMinorHorizontalGridlines.name: SetMinorHorizontalGridlines
SetMinorHorizontalGridlines.description: Specifies the visual properties for the minor horizontal gridlines.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the element shadow.

SetHorAxisLablesFontSize.name: SetHorAxisLablesFontSize
SetHorAxisLablesFontSize.description: Specifies font size for the labels of the horizontal axis.

params.name: nFontSize
params.description: The text size value measured in points.

SetVertAxisLablesFontSize.name: SetVertAxisLablesFontSize
SetVertAxisLablesFontSize.description: Specifies font size for the labels of the vertical axis.

params.name: nFontSize
params.description: The text size value measured in points.

RemoveSeria.name: RemoveSeria
RemoveSeria.description: Removes the specified series from the current chart.

params.name: nSeria
params.description: The index of the chart series.

SetSeriaValues.name: SetSeriaValues
SetSeriaValues.description: Sets values to the specified chart series.

params.name: aValues
params.description: The array of the data which will be set to the specified chart series.

params.name: nSeria
params.description: The index of the chart series.

SetXValues.name: SetXValues
SetXValues.description: Sets the x-axis values to all chart series. It is used with the scatter charts only.

params.name: aValues
params.description: The array of the data which will be set to the x-axis data points.

SetSeriaName.name: SetSeriaName
SetSeriaName.description: Sets a name to the specified chart series.

params.name: sName
params.description: The name which will be set to the specified chart series.

params.name: nSeria
params.description: The index of the chart series.

SetCategoryName.name: SetCategoryName
SetCategoryName.description: Sets a name to the specified chart category.

params.name: sName
params.description: The name which will be set to the specified chart category.

params.name: nCategory
params.description: The index of the chart category.

ApplyChartStyle.name: ApplyChartStyle
ApplyChartStyle.description: Sets a style to the current chart by style ID.

SetPlotAreaFill.name: SetPlotAreaFill
SetPlotAreaFill.description: Sets the fill to the chart plot area.

params.name: oFill
params.description: The fill type used to fill the plot area.

SetPlotAreaOutLine.name: SetPlotAreaOutLine
SetPlotAreaOutLine.description: Sets the outline to the chart plot area.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the plot area outline.

SetSeriesFill.name: SetSeriesFill
SetSeriesFill.description: Sets the fill to the specified chart series.

params.name: oFill
params.description: The fill type used to fill the series.

params.name: nSeries
params.description: The index of the chart series.

params.name: bAll
params.description: Specifies if the fill will be applied to all series.

SetSeriesOutLine.name: SetSeriesOutLine
SetSeriesOutLine.description: Sets the outline to the specified chart series.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the series outline.

params.name: nSeries
params.description: The index of the chart series.

params.name: bAll
params.description: Specifies if the outline will be applied to all series.

SetDataPointFill.name: SetDataPointFill
SetDataPointFill.description: Sets the fill to the data point in the specified chart series.

params.name: oFill
params.description: The fill type used to fill the data point.

params.name: nSeries
params.description: The index of the chart series.

params.name: nDataPoint
params.description: The index of the data point in the specified chart series.

params.name: bAllSeries
params.description: Specifies if the fill will be applied to the specified data point in all series.

SetDataPointOutLine.name: SetDataPointOutLine
SetDataPointOutLine.description: Sets the outline to the data point in the specified chart series.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the data point outline.

params.name: nSeries
params.description: The index of the chart series.

params.name: nDataPoint
params.description: The index of the data point in the specified chart series.

params.name: bAllSeries
params.description: Specifies if the outline will be applied to the specified data point in all series.

SetMarkerFill.name: SetMarkerFill
SetMarkerFill.description: Sets the fill to the marker in the specified chart series.

params.name: oFill
params.description: The fill type used to fill the marker.

params.name: nSeries
params.description: The index of the chart series.

params.name: nMarker
params.description: The index of the marker in the specified chart series.

params.name: bAllMarkers
params.description: Specifies if the fill will be applied to all markers in the specified chart series.

SetMarkerOutLine.name: SetMarkerOutLine
SetMarkerOutLine.description: Sets the outline to the marker in the specified chart series.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the marker outline.

params.name: nSeries
params.description: The index of the chart series.

params.name: nMarker
params.description: The index of the marker in the specified chart series.

params.name: bAllMarkers
params.description: Specifies if the outline will be applied to all markers in the specified chart series.

SetTitleFill.name: SetTitleFill
SetTitleFill.description: Sets the fill to the chart title.

params.name: oFill
params.description: The fill type used to fill the title.

SetTitleOutLine.name: SetTitleOutLine
SetTitleOutLine.description: Sets the outline to the chart title.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the title outline.

SetLegendFill.name: SetLegendFill
SetLegendFill.description: Sets the fill to the chart legend.

params.name: oFill
params.description: The fill type used to fill the legend.

SetLegendOutLine.name: SetLegendOutLine
SetLegendOutLine.description: Sets the outline to the chart legend.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the legend outline.

SetAxieNumFormat.name: SetAxieNumFormat
SetAxieNumFormat.description: Sets the specified numeric format to the axis values.

params.name: sFormat
params.description: Numeric format (can be custom format).

params.name: sAxiePos
params.description: Axis position.

SetSeriaNumFormat.name: SetSeriaNumFormat
SetSeriaNumFormat.description: Sets the specified numeric format to the chart series.

params.name: sFormat
params.description: Numeric format (can be custom format).

params.name: nSeria
params.description: Series index.

SetDataPointNumFormat.name: SetDataPointNumFormat
SetDataPointNumFormat.description: Sets the specified numeric format to the chart data point.

params.name: sFormat
params.description: Numeric format (can be custom format).

params.name: nSeria
params.description: Series index.

params.name: nDataPoint
params.description: The index of the data point in the specified chart series.

params.name: bAllSeries
params.description: Specifies if the numeric format will be applied to the specified data point in all series.
